input_datatypes.label: OpenShift Container Platform ETCD Node on VMware

template_input_params.name: bastion_host
template_input_params.description: Bastion host for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host

template_input_params.name: bastion_port
template_input_params.description: Bastion port for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion port

template_input_params.name: bastion_user
template_input_params.description: Bastion user for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user

template_input_params.name: bastion_private_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion private key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion private key

template_input_params.name: bastion_password
template_input_params.description: Bastion user password for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user password

template_input_params.name: bastion_host_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion host public key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host key

template_input_params.name: datacenter
template_input_params.description: The name of a datacenter in which to create the virtual machine and other assets.
template_input_params.label: Datacenter Name

template_input_params.name: resource_pool
template_input_params.description: Name of the default resource pool for the cluster. Must be specified as 'cluster_name/resource_pool'
template_input_params.label: Resource Pool Name

template_input_params.name: vm_folder
template_input_params.description: vSphere folder name to create the virtual vachine.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Folder Name

template_input_params.name: vm_image_template
template_input_params.description: Virtual machine image template name. If it is in a folder then include folder name as follows 'folder_name/image_template_name'
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Image Template Name

template_input_params.name: vm_domain_name
template_input_params.description: Virtual machine domain name.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Domain Name

template_input_params.name: vm_os_user
template_input_params.description: The user name to connect to the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Template User Name

template_input_params.name: vm_os_password
template_input_params.description: The user password to connect to the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Template User Password

template_input_params.name: vm_os_private_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: The user private key to connect to the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Template User Private Key (base64 encoded)

template_input_params.name: vm_os_public_ssh_key
template_input_params.description: Virtual Machine Template User Public Key to be added to the VM
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Template User Public Key

template_input_params.name: datastore
template_input_params.description: Virtual machine datastore name
template_input_params.label: Datastore Name

template_input_params.name: network
template_input_params.description: vSphere Network name.
template_input_params.label: Network name

template_input_params.name: adapter_type
template_input_params.description: Network adapter type for vNIC Configuration
template_input_params.label: Network Adapter Type

template_input_params.name: dns_servers
template_input_params.description: A list of DNS servers to add on the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: DNS Servers

template_input_params.name: dns_suffixes
template_input_params.description: A list of DNS search domains to add to the DNS configuration on the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: DNS Suffixes

template_input_params.name: vm_ipv4_gateway
template_input_params.description: IPv4 Gateway Address for network customization on the virtual machine.
template_input_params.label: IPv4 Gateway
template_input_params.regexdesc: Provide a Valid IP address for the Virtual Machine Gateway

template_input_params.name: vm_ipv4_netmask
template_input_params.description: Integer value between 1 and 32 for the prefix length (CIDR) to use when statically assigning an IPv4 address
template_input_params.label: IPv4 Netmask (CIDR)
template_input_params.regexdesc: Provide an integer value between 1 and 32

template_input_params.name: vm_clone_timeout
template_input_params.description: The timeout, in minutes, to wait for the virtual machine clone to complete.
template_input_params.label: Virtual Machine Clone Timeout

template_input_params.name: compute_node_enable_glusterfs
template_input_params.description: Indicates wether GlusterFS storage should be enabled on compute nodes
template_input_params.label: Enable GlusterFS (need at least 3 compute nodes)

template_input_params.name: compute_node_hostname_ip
template_input_params.description: Compute Node Hostname and IP Address
template_input_params.label: Compute Node Hostname and IP Address

template_input_params.description: Compute Node Memory Allocation (mb)
template_input_params.label: Compute Node Memory Allocation (mb)

template_input_params.description: Compute Node vCPU Allocation
template_input_params.label: Compute Node vCPU Allocation
